Typealiases.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions18R.name: RestorationHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions18R.abstract: A closure that, when executed, restores some state.

Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions6asse.name: assert(_:error:file:line:)
Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions6asse.abstract: Performs a traditional C-style assert with an Error.

Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions6asse.name: assert(_:_:file:line:)
Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions6asse.abstract: Performs a traditional C-style assert with an optional message.

Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions05fat.name: fatalError(_:file:line:)

Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions05fat.name: fatalError(_:file:line:)

Functions.html#/s:15ErrorAssertions12pre.name: precondition(_:error:file:line:)
